subject: Re: Really great EVP's, Bruce!!!
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Judy, if they are amplified speakers, they should work.

LC
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "judy_in_hollywood" 
<Ticket_to_Heaven@...> wrote:
>
> Wow! Bruce, you're getting some awesome EVP's in real-time - 
answering your questions! I'm thrilled at your progress!            
I've gotten some saying my first and some saying my last names!!!! 
That, convinces me it's not a radio station but actual 
voices/EVP's!!!                 I just wish I could find some 
inexpensive amplified speakers for the RS 12-469 I have that could get 
the volume up (with the speakers I have, I have to turn up the RS Hack 
volume to max, to hear/record)!  The Philips Sterio speakers at Rite 
Aid, ($13.) are round for PC, MP3, & CD's it says on the box, I'm 
wondering IF I should get them to try out?     =Judy=
>
